recipes.label: Recruit an Independent?
recipes.startdescription: No. This one has not forgotten what occurred between us. Perhaps, some day, if I do them no further harm, their feelings might change.

recipes.label: Recruit an Independent?
recipes.startdescription: This one might join me... if I can muster the Aspect of our cult, to the twenty-first degree. [You can recruit a Troublemaker, even one of a different persuasion, if you can provide enough power - but you must include at least one Tool as a gift to the independent.].

recipes.label: Exalt a Disciple?
recipes.startdescription: To Exalt a Disciple to an Assassin, I will need Edge to at least the twenty-first intensity. In any case, only the most savage will be suitable.

recipes.label: Exalt a Disciple?
recipes.startdescription: To Exalt a Disciple to a Reshaper, I will need Forge to at least the twenty-first intensity. In any case, only the most ingenious and effective will be suitable.

recipes.label: Exalt a Disciple?
recipes.startdescription: To Exalt a Disciple to a Cyprian, I will need Grail to at least the twenty-first intensity. In any case, only those with the most inconsolable appetites will be suitable.

recipes.label: Exalt a Disciple?
recipes.startdescription: To Exalt a Disciple to a Tarantellist, I will need Heart to at least the twenty-first intensity. In any case, only the most spirited will be suitable.

recipes.label: Exalt a Disciple?
recipes.startdescription: To Exalt a Disciple to a Key, I will need Knock to at least the twenty-first intensity.  In any case, only the most gifted will be suitable.

recipes.label: Exalt a Disciple?
recipes.startdescription: To Exalt a Disciple to a Seer, I will need Lantern to at least the twenty-first intensity.  In any case, only the most clear-sighted will be suitable.

recipes.label: Exalt a Disciple?
recipes.startdescription: To Exalt a Disciple to a Skintwister, I will need Moth to at least the twenty-first intensity.  In any case, only very rare individuals will be suitable.

recipes.label: Exalt a Disciple?
recipes.startdescription: To Exalt a Disciple to a degree that has no name, I will need Winter to at least the twenty-first intensity.  In any case, only the bleakest souls will be suitable.

recipes.label: Promote a Believer?
recipes.startdescription: To promote a Believer to a Disciple, I'll need to provide an appropriate aspect for the cult, to at least the seventh intensity.

recipes.label: My Benefactor Insists on Discretion
recipes.startdescription: 'We can't speak here, my dear. Let's be discreet.'

recipes.label: Recruit a new Follower?
recipes.startdescription: [Once you've established a cult, use TALK with the Cult to recruit an Acquaintance to your Cult's ranks.]

recipes.label: Recruit a new Follower?
recipes.startdescription: To recruit a follower, I will need a little of the power we revere. I might glean it from an Influence, or a Tool, or an Ingredient, or just the Lore of our tradition.

recipes.label: A Commission?
recipes.startdescription: 'How's that Commission coming along? I'm looking forward to your thoughts.'

recipes.label: A Commission?
recipes.startdescription: 'Hullo. Do you have something for me? The Commission?'

recipes.label: A Commission?
recipes.startdescription: 'Please, will you conclude the Commission? My colleagues are in urgent need of the information.'

recipes.label: A Commission?
recipes.startdescription: 'Oh, do hurry with that Commission! I can't wait.'

recipes.label: Fulfil a Commission for the Doctor?
recipes.startdescription: 'Mm. I was hoping for more.' [Check the Commission details.]

recipes.label: Fulfil a Commission for Mme Bechet?
recipes.startdescription: 'Sorry, not quite. I wanted something a little different.' [Check the Commission details.]

recipes.label: Fulfil a Commission for the Count?
recipes.startdescription: 'No no no. This will not do. My instructions were most specific.' [Check the Commission details.]

recipes.label: Fulfil a Commission for Poppy?
recipes.startdescription: 'Oh, dear. I'm sorry. I need more... insight.' [Check the Commission details.]

recipes.label: Nothing to say?
recipes.startdescription: 'I don't believe we have anything to say to each other.'
